author: "Tingsong Ou"
date: "1/31/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse);

```


```{r reduce}
data <- read_csv('data/covid_data.csv');
stateData <- data %>% filter(long != 'NA') %>% 
  filter(long < 0) %>%
  group_by(state = state) %>% 
  summarise(long = mean(long),
            lat = mean(lat),
            cases = sum(cases),
            death = sum(deaths));

countyData <- data %>% select(2:3, 5:8) %>%
  filter(long != 'NA') %>% filter(long < 0);

write.csv(stateData, 'data/stateData.csv');
write.csv(countyData, 'data/countyData.csv');
"write.csv(mortData,'data/MortData_reduced.csv');"
```
